column1: Vin Bruce Born Ervin Vin" Bruce (April 25
column3: 2018) Singer and Songwriter. Born in Cut Off
column4: Louisiana.  Was one of the first Cajun musicians to appear on the Louisiana Hayride and Grand Ole Opry.  Was known as "the King of Cajun Singers" Also
column5: known for 1961 Jole Blon and 1979 Cajun Country songs.
